title: 4 Four Lakes Village Condo in Lisle 60532 Fireplace + Washer & Dryer
map_address: Oakwood Drive near Four Lakes Avenue
posting_body: THIS IS ONE OF THE NICEST BUILDINGS IN FOUR LAKES VILLAGE, LISLE.
2 ELEVATORS IN THIS SECURE, CAMERA MONITORED BUILDING.
THIS 1 BEDROOM UNIT IS SUPER CLEAN AND LOOKS LIKE NEW.
IT HAS BEEN ALL UPGRADED INCLUDING, CERAMIC DOUBLE BOWL KITCHEN SINK AND ALL 6 PANEL DOORS.
FULL SIZE WASHER AND DRYER INSIDE THE UNIT.
VERY RARE, PRIVATE UNIT WITH NO SHARED WALLS TO OTHER UNITS, COMBINED WITH FLEXICORE FLOORS AND R-#* CEILING INSULATION FOR LESS NOISE AND MUCH LOWER UTILITY COSTS THAN OTHER UNITS.
FEATURES INCLUDE BRAND NEW CENTRAL HEATING & AIR CONDITIONING WITH A REAL WOOD BURNING FIREPLACE.
HUGE BALCONY WITH 3 SEPARATE EXITS.
THE RENT ALSO INCLUDES WATER, SEWER AND TRASH REMOVAL.
ENJOY ON SITE RESTURAUNT, PUB "BASE CAMP" FREE UNLIMITED USE OF THE SKI HILL WITH EQUIPMENT, LIFT PASS, ETC.
4 SWIMMING POOLS, 6 TENNIS COURTS, 8 SAND VOLLEYBALL COURTS, 5k AND 10k WALKING, RUNNING, BIKING TRAILS, SAIL BOATING, CANOEING, KAYAKING, FISHING, RESIDENT PARTIES AND LOTS MORE.
CONVIENCE STORE AND HEALTH CLUB ALL ON SITE.
RIVER BEND GOLF
COURSE
RIGHT NEXT DOOR.
350 ACRES OF RESORT STYLE LIVING AT ITS BEST.
JEWEL AND ALDI FOOD STORES ARE JUST ACROSS THE STREET.
LISLE IS SURROUNDED BY THE TOWNS OF WHEATON, GLEN ELLYN, NAPERVILLE, DOWNERS GROVE, AND WOODRIDGE.
LOCATED MINUTES FROM BENIDICTINE COLLEGE, COLLEGE OF DUPAGE, NORTH CENTRAL COLLEGE, DOWNTOWN NAPERVILLE, I-355 AND I-88.
PACE BUS SERVICE FROM YOUR DRIVEWAY TO LISLE TRAIN STATION GOING EAST TO CHICAGO & WEST TO GENEVA.
WHO NEEDS A CAR?
THIS IS A NON SMOKING UNIT.
A LONG TERM LEASE IS OK.
THIS UNIT IS VACANT & READY TO MOVE IN TOMORROW.
TO SET UP A SHOWING SEE EVERGREEN REAL ESTATE 1815 WALLACE AVE.
#308 SAINT.
CHARLES IL.
60174 OR PHONE six three zero 740-1677
